content: अवदॄ {c9c} <ab>P.</ab> To split or force open, to rend or tear asunder. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To cause to burst, to rend, split; मनःशिलागिरेः शृंगं वज्रेणेवावदारितं <ls>Rām.</ls> {@--2@} To dig down, excavate; तदर्थमुर्वीमवदारयद्भिः <ls>R. 13. 3</ls>; वसुधां चावदारयेत् <ls>Rām.</ls>
